name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save That Group - Save & Sync your GroupTabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to save and sync your group tabs

ğŸ”¥A simple way to save and sync your group tabs!ğŸ”¥

 â­ï¸Just hit Save group and it will save new groups and update any existing one!
 â­ï¸It will sync automatically across any Chrome browser that you are logged into! 

***Important notes***
âœ”ï¸All groups are stored by the group name!
